mapper.update:
update litigation
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS id, b.NAME AS cname, b.mobile AS mobile, b.id_card AS idcard, b.address AS address, b.identity_address AS identityaddress, b.company_name AS companyname, b.company_address AS companyaddress, b.company_phone AS companyphone, b.reserve_mobile AS reservemobile, d.`name` AS sname, e.`name` AS pname, g.`name` AS gname, f.area_name AS aname, e.biz_type AS biztype, b.cprovince AS cprovince, b.ccity AS ccity, b.ccounty AS ccounty, b.hprovince AS hprovince, b.hcity AS hcity, b.hcounty AS hcounty FROM loan_order a LEFT JOIN loan_customer b ON a.loan_customer_id = b.id LEFT JOIN loan_base_info c on a.loan_base_info_id = c.id LEFT JOIN employee d on c.salesman_id = d.id LEFT JOIN partner e on c.partner_id = e.id
LEFT JOIN department g on d.department_id = g.id LEFT JOIN loan_base_info h on a.loan_base_info_id = h.id LEFT JOIN base_area f on h.area_id = f.area_id WHERE b.cust_type = 1 and a.id = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
